hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: templates
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: name of templates to provision with, whitespace delimited list (e.g.: ci-{repo} build-{repo})

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
if [[ -z $PROVISIONER ]]; then exit 0 fi
if [[ ! -d ~/.chamberlain/libs ]]; then exit 0 fi
cd ~/.chamberlain/libs
for dir in $(ls); do cd $dir if [[ -d .git ]]; then git add . && git reset --hard && git clean -ffdx git fetch --all git checkout origin/master fi cd .. done

#!/bin/bash -xe
if [[ -z $PROVISIONER ]]; then exit 0 fi
if [[ -z $GITHUB_DOMAIN ]]; then GITHUB_DOMAIN=github.com fi
rm -rf $repo || : git clone git@$GITHUB_DOMAIN:$repo ./$repo cd $repo
if [[ -f $JENKINS_HOME/credentials ]]; then echo "Sourcing $JENKINS_HOME/credentials" cat $JENKINS_HOME/credentials source $JENKINS_HOME/credentials fi
# This instance should NOT be able to provision webhooks if [[ ! -z $PROVISIONER ]]; then SSH_KEY="{gitauth}" OAUTH_ID="{ghprauth}" fi
chamberlain gh-sync -f local $templates --params gitauth:$SSH_KEY ghprauth:$OAUTH_ID

#!/bin/bash -xe
if [[ -z $PROVISIONER ]]; then exit 0 fi
if [[ -z $TEMPLATE_GIT_URL ]]; then exit 0 fi
# cache template changes if configured on a provisioner instance. # yup. REPO_NAME=$(echo $TEMPLATE_GIT_URL|cut -d: -f2) rm -rf $TEMPLATE_DIR/$REPO_NAME || : git clone $TEMPLATE_GIT_URL $TEMPLATE_DIR/$REPO_NAME cp -R ~/.chamberlain/workspace/* $TEMPLATE_DIR/$REPO_NAME
# commit & push cd $TEMPLATE_DIR/$REPO_NAME # remove cached libs rm -rf templates git add . commit_msg="template sync $repo [$templates] $(date +"%b %d, %Y")" git commit -m "$commit_msg" && git push origin master || :
cd $JENKINS_HOME/jobs for job in $(ls|grep -v 'provision\|provision-repo\|self-update\|template-update'); do rm -rf $job done
curl -X POST 127.0.0.1:8080/reload
